name: Witch Hunt (itch) (Emily)
description: A short game about a little witch and her cat searching the forest for ingredients at the request of her mentor witch. I created this for a final game project, but it is a game on its own, of course, as well, so it is available to everyone! Created in RPG Maker MV; Assets created by Emily Newman and RPG Maker MV; Story by Emily Newman. Enjoy!
